Topic.Title: Stolen boots still give Worn status (solved)

Posts.EditableText:
I know this one is easy...I just can't figure it out. My brain must be going to mush.
The player has his boots stolen (that he was wearing) I move the boots to another room. Yet now the player can not put other shoes on...because the boots that were moved still show as (worn)
How do I change that to false?

Posts.EditableText:
`RemoveGarment (boots)`

Garments which leave the player's inventory without being removed will still apply any stat bonuses they give and have "(worn)" on their listalias, but I can't see how they would stop you wearing another item. Maybe there's another issue here.

If the game says I am still wearing boots...it removes the Wear Verb option for any other boots because they have the same wear spot.
